input.sentences: took a trip to a place we called old tree when i was a kid .
strolling along i can remember a time when we camped and had fun here .
now i come back as a grown up and ca n't wait to bring my family here .
watching all the people play makes me want to get married .
output.sentences: That looks like the Weeping Willow that we had in my front yard when I was a kid.
This tree reminds me of a stormy day when we ran for shelter
I love the beach when it's quiet and the tide is in.
We are fortunate to have water and the beautiful mountains.
